data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: mussel growth temperature data: Fogarty Creek, Oregon, USA (FCKX00)

This metadata record describes a mix of intertidal seawater and air temperature data collected at Fogarty Creek, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway TidbiT Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2002-07-12. Mussel Growth temperature loggers are bolted down in a wire cage at the mussel growth sites. Mussel growth tidbits are set to sample at 2 minute intervals from April to September and 10 minute intervals from September to April.
